name: Google - Homestuck
description: Homestuck themed Google Homepage layout. The style will not affect the search result pages, only the starting page for Google. You can also change the style in the CSS if there is something you would like to have another way. Thanks and enjoy! ♥

user.name: Sara Svesar
user.about:
Casual programmer studying C#, who also likes writing in CSS and JavaScript. ★
I like to play games and draw on my spare time! ♥ Cat lover ♥

additional_info:
Change Log: 20/4/2017
- Made an update where the background will no longer appear white upon reload of the page. 
- Minor changes to the colors of the: login/out button, searching with images function. 
- Fixed the regexp-url so that it only works on the homepage(s). 
- Added style to the pop-up keyboard to match the search bar.

Change Log: 02/10/2018
- Bug fixes such as, reapplying the main background picture and removing some white borders. 
- Updated some classes to work with new Google updates. 
- Changed the regexp to exclude some unnecessary pages.
